titleStmt.title: The Banners of grace and love displayed in the farther conversion of the Indians in New-England held forth in sundry letters from divers ministers to the corporation established by Parliament, for promoting the Gospel amongst the heathen in New-England : and farther attested by Edm. Callamy, Simon Ashe, VVill Spurstow, Lazarus Seaman, George Griffith, [brace] [brace] Phil Nye, VVilliam Bridge, Henry VVhitfield, Joseph Carryll, Ralph Venning.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Godbid, for Edw. Farnham, and are to be sold at his shop in Popeshead-Alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
